data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: to beat on the head, subdue, tame, goad (an elephant) on the head, persecute, overpower, apply a mace or whip or grips, curb, restrain, hold in subjection, bring to submission. miqma'ah - mace, red whip.
data.sentence: The word مَقَامِعُ comes from the root ق م ع and is associated with the meanings: to beat on the head, subdue, tame, goad (an elephant) on the head, persecute, overpower, apply a mace or whip or grips, curb, restrain, hold in subjection, bring to submission. miqma'ah - mace, red whip.

data.meanings: To define a limit, determine (a thing), punish (a culprit), prevent, thrust back, throw back, sharpen.
data.sentence: The word حَدِيدٍ comes from the root ح د د and is associated with the meanings: To define a limit, determine (a thing), punish (a culprit), prevent, thrust back, throw back, sharpen.
